title: Advertising Discovery
alt: When advertisers figure this out, our only weapon will be blue sharpies and "[disputed]".
transcript:
Advertising discovery:
[Person sits at computer, reading an ad on the screen. The bracketed superscripts are blue.]
Ad: TurgidaxÂ® triples[2] your penis size overnight,[2][5] improving both your sexual attractiveness[2][7] and your cardiovascular health.[7][8][9]
Person (thinking): Sounds legit.
Caption: Wikipedia has trained us to believe anything followed by little blue numbers in brackets.
